review: Lots of shows, good variety. Much better than cable. Great value
author: T Longcolt

review: I like that it gives me a lot of options, but not all the shows I wash are in amazon for free. That's what I don't like about it. But the Fire TV Stick is pretty good.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Amazing streaming device for the price
author: Peter

review: I have only had the device for a couple weeks.  It works seamlessly with my wifi.  Great for taking with us to access movies on vacation or at grandma's house, which is why I ordered it.  Cost and function is a win!
author: R. Tessari

review: Grandson lives it. Descent price as well.
author: Linda Taylor
